alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 9:26AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Tuscaloosa, northeastern Greene and northeastern Hale Counties through 1015 AM CDT... At 926 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Knoxville, or 15 miles northeast of Eutaw, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tuscaloosa, Holt, Moundville, McFarland Mall, Shelton State Community College, Bryant Denny Stadium, University Mall, Knoxville, Snoddy, Englewood, Ralph, Cottondale, Little Sandy, Maxwell, Moundville Airport, Fosters Boat Landing, Hull, Mound State Park, Stillman College and Elliots Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
